paragraphs.title: TLDR
paragraphs.content:
Hey there! Thanks for visiting my website! I'm Soumya, currently a Graphics Reporter (Intern) at Thomson Reuters in New York City. In today’s attention economy, I believe the strongest way to tell stories and build trust is through direct, transparent communication, showing the data behind the narrative.

My work explores the intersection of data, design, and code, pushing the boundaries of what these tools can create together. I’m always excited to chat about this space (and more things like the right way to make an iced latte) so please reach out at soumyakarwa01@gmail.com.
